en.name: man - an interface to the off-line reference manuals
en.description: man is MSS' manual pager. Each argument given to man is normally the name of the program, utility or function. The manual page assiated with each of these arguments is then found and displayed.

examples.description: Returns a list of all commands
Returns a man page, just like this one
